span.span: is less than zero.

Docs.exception:
此异常会在下列任一情况下发生：This exception can occur under one of the following conditions:
- 是多维的 is multidimensional
- 等于或大于 的长度 is equal to, or greater than, the length of
- 源 中的元素数目大于从 到目标 末尾之间的可用空间。The number of elements in the source is greater than the space available from to the end of the destination .

exception.span: 无法自动将源 的类型转换为目标 的类型。

span.span: The type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Get 方法的尝试转换并返回值以字符串形式的对象始终; 否则它将返回的字节数组。The Get method of always attempts to convert and return the value object as a string; otherwise it returns a byte array. 若要获取更好的性能，请使用方法如果你知道属性值的返回类型。To get a better performance, use the method if you know the return type of the attribute value.

exception.span: 要设置的 为无效类型。

span.span: to set is an invalid type.

exception.span: 有效类型为 byte[]、字符串或 URI。

span.span: The valid types are byte[], string, or URI.
